TitleEnglish: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World
SummaryEnglish:
After the betrayal of his companions, Haruyoshi, the strongest diviner, was on the verge of dying. Hoping to be happy in the next life, he attempted the secret reincarnation technique and was sent to a different world!

Born into a family of magicians, the magic he didn't inherit paled in comparison to his previous abilities as an onmyouji. "Who needs magic? I'll survive in this world with my old techniques!"
Aliases: 最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 ～下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが～
Saikyō Onmyōji no Isekai Tenseiki: Geboku no Yōkai-domo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowasugirunda ga
Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki: Geboku no Youkai-domo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowasugirunda ga
Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tensei-ki ~Geboku no Youkai-domo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowasugiru n da ga~
最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 〜下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが〜
The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji
The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji ~These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai~
The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World~ These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Monsters~
A Record of the Strongest Onmyōji's Reincarnation to Another World
The Reincarnation of the Strongest Diviner: These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai
The Reincarnation of the Strongest Diviner

1.SummaryEnglish: The world's strongest exorcist is a master of Japanese magic who is betrayed by his country and killed because of his power. He reincarnates in a fantasy world where he has no magical power at all, but...

2.SummaryEnglish: Seika grows up and enrolls in a magical academy.

3.TitleEnglish: The Hero the Oracles Spoke Of
3.SummaryEnglish: Seika arrives at the academy only to quickly fight himself in a fight with a terrible devil.

4.SummaryEnglish: Inglis makes a new friend after a complex battle involving the leader of the Bloodchain Brigade.

5.SummaryEnglish: Seika meets a powerful girl named Mabel and heads to a combat tournament in the capital.

6.SummaryEnglish: Seika makes his way through the tournament while he searches to find out what's really going on.

7.SummaryEnglish: The truth about Kyle and Mabel is revealed.

8.SummaryEnglish: Seika heads to another country to investigate a rampaging dragon.

9.SummaryEnglish: The prince tries to force Yifa to join his harem, while Seika makes friends with the dragon.

10.SummaryEnglish: Seika meets a princess with the power to see the future.

11.SummaryEnglish: Seika comes to learn more of Fiona and her powers.

12.SummaryEnglish: Seika unleashes his power against a group of demon assassins.

13.SummaryEnglish: When the Empire attempts to execute Amyu, Seika unleashes his full power to save her.
